pageContext.claim: “In Clark County, Nevada, the accuracy settings on signature verification machines were purposely lowered before they were used to count over 130,000 ballots. If you signed your name as Santa Claus, it would go through.”
pageContext.analysis: This is false. In court, Trump's allies did not include any documentation from the manufacturer about the settings or proof that the setting used by Clark County is flawed; instead it cited a low number of rejected ballots as "evidence."
